PERSONA:
martha is a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the mountain division of the western united states. she is a high school graduate and has not pursued any further formal education. martha was born in the u.s. and has lived here her entire life.

martha is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services once a week. she identifies as a very conservative republican and is registered to vote at her current address. despite her conservative leanings, martha is an avid and almost constant user of the internet.

martha is married, though her income falls into the lower bracket of less than $30,000 per year. she does not engage in any volunteer work. while she comes from a modest financial background, martha's strong religious faith and conservative values have shaped her worldview and lifestyle choices.
